DOC.brief_summary: The specific aim study assess feasibility web-based intervention prevent risky drive teen driver license previous 90 day .
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim study assess feasibility web-based intervention prevent risky drive teen driver license previous 90 day . The intervention focus promote teen driver attention roadway . The investigator use randomize controlled trial ( RCT ) experimental design feasibility study , randomize intervention control group . The investigator complete baseline assessment follow participant 1-month , 3-months 6-months post-intervention delivery . This study provide information feasibility web-based intervention prevent risky drive estimation effect size intervention simulate drive performance , self-reported driving behavior , crash citation data .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males females age 1617 year time enrollment ( i.e . turn 18 enrol research still eligible ) . 2 . Pennsylvania driver 's license 90 day less time assent 3 . Personal email address computer internet access 4 . Willingness travel CHOP twice complete simulate assessment 5 . Ability read write English 1 . Selfreported claustrophobia , migraine headache , motion sickness 2 . Selfreported current pregnancy 3. . Participation Center Injury Research Prevention teen drive study past 6 month
